channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Script Security Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Script Security Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2110|2024-08-04T07:01:39.727Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: Sandbox protection in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.69 and earlier could be circumvented during the script compilation phase by applying AST transforming annotations to imports or by using them inside of other annotations.

item.title: CVE-2020-2190|2024-08-04T07:01:41.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.72 and earlier does not correctly escape pending or approved classpath entries on the In-process Script Approval page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2134|2024-08-04T07:01:40.721Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: Sandbox protection in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.70 and earlier could be circumvented through crafted constructor calls and crafted constructor bodies.

item.title: CVE-2020-2135|2024-08-04T07:01:41.104Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: Sandbox protection in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.70 and earlier could be circumvented through crafted method calls on objects that implement GroovyInterceptable.

item.title: CVE-2020-2279|2024-08-04T07:01:41.169Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.74 and earlier allows attackers with permission to define sandboxed scripts to provide crafted return values or script binding content that can result in arbitrary code execution on the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-08-02T02:43:00.455Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-08-02T02:42:59.914Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-06-06T18:23:32.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-06-06T18:23:11.386Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.
